channel.title: Hi im new and i need a lot of help!
channel.description:
hi, im new here, ive played runescape before and got bored of it.
so i need help, i dont kno how to make an account, and start playing the game. can some1 please give me step-by-step instructions from the beginnning inorder to play this game?
kthnxbai

item.title: Hi im new and i need a lot of help!
item.dc:creator: @da_man1 da man1
item.description:
@da_man1 wrote:

Some things to read before getting started:

  1. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,312285.0.html
  2. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html
  3. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,112.0.html (maybe just scroll through that one and learn the staff)
  4. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294981.0.html (look to see what names to not have in topics)
  5. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,91.0.html (just 317 server hackings. Nothing special.)
  6. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,255374.0.html (idk just look. About 317 hackings I guess)
  7. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=mlist (look through some of the members and read about them)
  8. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,317847.0.html
  9. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,195700.0.html (READ THIS! IT HELPS!)
  10. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288210.0.html
  11. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,267609.0.html
  12. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,274272.0.html (THE RULES!!!)
    IDK thats just kind of a guide of how things work and some other pointless stuff I put together.
    I suggest you look at #9 and #12. BUT LOOK THROUGH THEM ALL! That should give you some somewhat basic guidlines of this.
    -da man1

Read full topic
item.source: Hi im new and i need a lot of help!

Tis better not be a joke douche bag

. . .

Go to the client help sectin and click the stickied guide on how to get started . . .
